QuestData.Title: Battle Worms
QuestData.Description: Snowmane Village behind us was caught completely off guard by the scale of this attack. I will hold the drogbar line here so the civilians have time to prepare their evacuation.$b$bThe drogbar are using worms to burrow their way to the surface and deploy their troops.$b$bI am giving you command of our forces. Use them to slay these worms and cut off enemy reinforcements.
QuestData.CompletionText: Worms. Why did it have to be worms? I hate worms.
QuestData.RewardText: That should slow these invaders down.
